title: Ruled by her Daddies
description: One was a friend.One was a former lover.And the other was her nemesis.Hurt, alone and out of options, they’re her last hope. And her every desire.Three gorgeous, sexy men to crave. Three alpha personalities to navigate. Three daddies to cherish and indulge her…And discipline her.Welcome to Escana, where the men are gorgeous, dominant and they like to share their women.
author: Laylah Roberts
